About me.

Education

2018 - 2020

-

Business Adminstration |{" "} Chonnam National University

2020 ~ {" "}

-

Computer Science |{" "} Korea Advanced Institute of Science and technology

Relevant Coursework

  • CS101 - Introduction to Programming using Python
  • CoE202 - Basics of Artificial Intelligence
  • CS206 - Data Structures and Algorithms
  • CS300 - Introduction to Algorithms
  • CS220 - Programming Principles
  • CS230 - System Programming
  • CS360 - Introduction to Database
  • CS376 - Machine Learnings

Programming

Python

I have been coding in Python for about 2 years. Over the period, I have finished several Python books and courses and built some projects including small games and puzzles. Here are the some of the Python libraries I have worked with:

  • Pytorch
  • Pygame
  • Numpy
  • Pandas

Javascript

I love Javascript ! It is a very creative language. Although I have only one year of experience of Javascript, I have learned a lot about this language, spending at least 5-6 hours a day on it. Some related framework and libaries I have learned include the following:

  • Node Js
  • React Js
  • Express Js
  • React-router
  • Redux
  • Mongoose

SQL, mongoDB

  • Node Js
  • React Js
  • Express Js
  • React-router
  • Redux
  • Mongoose

Java, C, Haskell

These languages are the ones I have learned quite well when I took the courses at KAIST. Since C++ was my first and favourite language, I am quite good at Java and C while I have not done any noteworthy project using Haskell.
